title: Derpy Evelynn

embed.description: lazy to rant so heres the link to the song, prolly gonna post my last creator suite edit vid then stop using it in general so yea Song - Goblins From Mars : Ambush https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pFgnrd6ZXDM

body: Uh yeah, part 2 of my very derpy editing with creator suite, like if u enjoyed or like the video ( minus the derp parts ) and subscribe to help me out really would appreciate it, #CringySellout2016-2017 {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: The problem with videos like these is they won't be interesting unless you get some really cool plays/outplays (Which is why I rarely upload), maybe you could try searching for high elo players and doing montages of them?

yea ik, i just ended up using these mainly cuz like i said im just practicing creator suite, not expecting them to be anything special, after im done with this last vid ill start using plays or wat not assuming baron replays isnt gonna be a twat with me
You could try using OBS or just downloading the replays in the new client?
nah i can download the stuff just fine, i just forget to turn on baron replays sometimes

ERMAGAWD, KAZEKAMI SENAPAI I LOVE U - from your fan girl

( pls, just kill me ) (( i need a life ))

nah no way im kazekami senapai, hehe exs dee im just his lovely fan girl
